columns.name: _certifiedByActor
columns.description: Reference to the Actor certifying the result of the Check if required

columns.name: _resultValue
columns.description: Information about a result Value of any kind of the Check

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _checkRemark
columns.description: Free text remarks to the check result

columns.name: _passed
columns.description: Boolean indicating whether the Check was passed

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
